LanguageData.VWE_SmokeGrenade.label: smoke grenades
LanguageData.VWE_SmokeGrenade.description: Grenades loaded with liquified blind smoke. Upon landing, they instantly release their smoke payload. The non-toxic smoke covers an area, greatly reducing ranged accuracy and completely blocking automated turret targeting. It provides tactical cover for about a minute before dissipating.
LanguageData.VWE_SmokeGrenade.verbs.0.label: throw smoke grenade
LanguageData.VWE_Projectile_SmokeGrenade.label: smoke grenade
LanguageData.VWE_FlashGrenade.label: stun grenades
LanguageData.VWE_FlashGrenade.description: A non-lethal tactical grenade designed to temporarily incapacitate enemies. Upon detonation, it emits a powerful flash of light and a loud sound, disorienting and stunning enemies in a radius, buying time for tactical advances or retreats.
LanguageData.VWE_FlashGrenade.verbs.0.label: throw flash grenade
LanguageData.VWE_Projectile_FlashGrenade.label: flash grenade
